mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT post_id, user_id FROM post_favorites WHERE post = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_favorites (post_id, user_id) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}) ON CONFLICT (post_id, user_id) DO NOTHING
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_favorites WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
